channel.title: UnholyPK - Torva/Handcannon/everything - [PI]
channel.description:
Well im kinda new to coding and I would LOVE to have a few pro's help me with my first real "project". I'm using torvapkz base, its a PI.
Things I need: [template]: name: real life name: how do you want to be called: MSN name: skype (no webcam atm, sorry!): proof of work: time: (amount of time you are willing to spend on this) computer stability: orther things you might want to tell: [/template]
Modeller(s) [0/2] animation maker(s) [0/2] source coders [0/3] client coders [0/3] hoster (can be me, but I can't portfoward as the password of my modem should be beneath it but it isn't) [0/1] NOTE THAT NOT ALL OF THOSE PLACES HAVE TO BE TAKEN, ITS JUST THE MAX THAT I'LL BE TAKING
planned projects:
more bosses much pk area's prices of items/shops/amounts of items in shops COMPLETELY BALANCED 100% pking, staking, trading etc without dupes (already has as far as I know) voting with choiche of good rewards 100% working auto donating system, winch allows credit cards, wallie cards, paypal, IDEAL, and paybyphone services orther, small things like giving torva healing and handcannon firing A LOT of unique stuff, like unique self-made bosses, items (no black phats, or orther awfull recolorings of things, only really UNIQUE items that don't resemble rs items but recolored), self made minigames, and all that sort of FUN stuff!
For example, I already have an costum area in mind with new armour and weapons, new npc's, a new minigame, etc
pictures will come once I get em!!
credits: TeamTorva - TorvaPkz base ErasedPkz - base TorvaPkz is made off Project Insanity - base ErasedPkz is made off And of course all of you guys for helping me!

Well im kinda new to coding and I would LOVE to have a few pro’s help me with my first real “project”.
I’m using torvapkz base, its a PI.

Things I need:

planned projects:

more bosses
much pk area’s
